title: Trendy One Bed in South Loop!Must see!
posting_body: Contact Us For More Information!This building put residents in touch with the rhythm of the city.
The South Loop luxury apartment offer incomparable amenities, and we are surrounded by great shopping, exciting night life, and outstanding restaurants.
Our downtown Chicago apartment exemplify the latest in city living.

This fabulous building include a fully equipped fitness center and private yoga studio; an internet cafe with coffee bar; a rooftop resident lounge; a scenic rooftop sundeck with outdoor fireplace; a private conference room.
Our downtown Chicago apartment in the South Loop is also pet-friendly with a dog run.
And our residents Breatheasy because we are a smoke-free community.
